basket.title: Rib-knit wool-bend cardigan
basket.description: Cropped cardigan in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, cuffed, raglan balloon sleeves.

products.title: Cardigan with zip
products.description: Soft cardigan in ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip at front, and side pockets. Ribbing at cuffs and hem.

products.title: Regular Fit Cotton T-shirt
products.description: Regular-fit T-shirt in soft jersey made from premium cotton. Crew neck with fine ribbing.

products.title: Relaxed Fit Pima Cotton Vest
products.description: Relaxed-fit, fine-knit sweater vest in pima cotton. V-neck and ribbing at neck, armholes, and hem.

products.title: Relaxed Fit Fine-knit Sweater
products.description: Soft, fine-knit sweater. Crew neck, dropped shoulders, and long sleeves. Ribbing at neck, cuffs, and hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement for a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

products.title: Twill Car Coat
products.description: Car coat in twill. Collar, concealed buttons at front, long sleeves, and adjustable cuffs with tab and buttons. Diagonal front pockets, two inner pockets, and a vent at back. Lined.

products.title: Regular Fit Slacks
products.description: Short slacks in thick cotton twill. Covered elastic at waistband, zip fly with button, side pockets, and open back pockets. Regular Fit – classic fit with good room for movement over thighs and knees for a comfortable, straight silhouette.

products.title: Regular Fit Cotton Shorts
products.description: Regular-fit shorts in woven cotton fabric. Drawstring waistband with covered elastic and mock fly. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.

products.title: Slim Fit Sports Joggers
products.description: Jersey joggers for indoor and outdoor workouts. Waistband with covered elastic and a drawstring. Side pockets for safer storage of valuables, mesh panel at gusset for increased air permeability, and cuff at hems.

products.title: Regular Jeans
products.description: 5-pocket jeans in stretch cotton denim. Regular waist, zip fly with button, and straight legs with good room for movement over thighs and knees.

products.title: Slim Fit Crop Slacks
products.description: Crop slacks in woven fabric. Waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fastener, button, and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit – close-fitting at thighs and knees for a tailored silhouette.

products.title: Rib-knit wool-bend cardigan
products.description: Cropped cardigan in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, cuffed, raglan balloon sleeves.

products.title: Collar-detail jumper
products.description: Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed collar and a V-shaped opening at the front. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with ribbed trims, and ribbing at the hem.

products.title: Sweatshirt
products.description: Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

products.title: V-neck blouse
products.description: V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

products.title: Tie-belt twill coat
products.description: Calf-length coat in twill with notch lapels, a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Raglan sleeves, diagonal welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

products.title: Slacks
products.description: Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with concealed elastication, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

products.title: Curvy Ultra High Jeggings
products.description: Description: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeggings in superstretch denim with a high waist and skinny legs.

products.title: Wide trousers
products.description: Trousers in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and wide, straight legs with creases.

products.title: Denim skirt high waist
products.description: Short, 5-pocket skirt in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated waist and button fly.

products.title: Mom Ultra High Denim
products.description: 5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
